World

    • <Unnamed>中World的使用

      参数类型为World的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AggressiveMonster.chasePlayer(float dx, float dy, World world)
      Aggressive monsters chase player when they detect him
      void PassiveMonster.escapeFromPlayer(Player player, int delta, World world)
      passive try to escape from the player when it is attacked
      void Player.update(int dir_x, int dir_y, int delta, World world)
      update player's position
      void PassiveMonster.update(Player player, int delta, boolean AIsOn, World world)
      update the passive monster's position
      void AggressiveMonster.update(Player player, int delta, boolean AIsOn, World world)
      update monster and player after they had battle
      abstract void Monster.update(Player player, int delta, boolean AIsOn, World world)
      update the monster's state
      void PassiveMonster.wander(int delta, World world)
      the passive wonder around
